description:
Gintoki helps Shachi, his partner in the mangaka duo Akurogi Musai, confess to a woman he`s infatuated with, and later with meeting a deadline.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Editor Is Enough / The G-Pen Is Capricious, and the Maru Pen Is Stubborn
Tantou Henshuu wa Hitori de Tariru / G-pen wa Kimagureya-san Maru-pen wa Gankomono
Un seul éditeur suffit / Le G-Pen est capricieux, le Maru est têtu
担当編集は一人で足りる / Gペンは気まぐれ屋さん丸ペンは頑固者
